text.style: font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #231f20;
font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: 700; fill: #231f20;
font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;

svg.text: Estamos muito entusiasmados por ter-te connosco.

text.style: font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;

svg.text: Agora, já podes desfrutar das vantagens de ser DIGI, como ter sempre o nosso

text.style: font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;

svg.text: melhor preço ou receber uma fatura sem surpresas.

text.style: font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;

svg.text: Aqui, encontras o teu número de telemóvel e o código ICCID associado ao teu

text.style: font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;

svg.text: novo cartão SIM, para que possas identificá-lo facilmente caso tenhas contratado

text.style: font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;
font-size: 9px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: 700; fill: #010101;
font-size: 9px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: 700; fill: #010101;
font-size: 8.5px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;
font-size: 8.5px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;
font-size: 8.5px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;
font-size: 8.5px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #010101;
font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #231f20;

svg.text: Em caso de dúvida, não hesites em contactar-nos através do 923 30 90 30 (gratuito

text.style: font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #231f20;

svg.text: na rede DIGI e com custo de uma chamada normal para outros operadores).

text.style: font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #231f20;
font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; fill: #231f20;
font-size: 10px; font-family: DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: 700; fill: #231f20;
